medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric abdominal pain radiating to the back.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms started 3 days ago with intermittent pain that has progressed to constant pain. Accompanied by nausea but without vomiting. The patient reports a moderate amount of alcohol consumption.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Obesity, unspecified; Asthma, unspecified; Rhinitis - allergic, unspecified cause; Past episodes of constipation and sinusitis.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of gastrointestinal disorders; mother has Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus.
medical_history.social_history: Moderate alcohol consumption (4 glasses of vodka with juice); usually has 1-2 beers once per week.
